Header: A new program to seize illegal firearms
Content: Inspector General of Police Pujith Jayasundera says a special mission will be conducted to seize illegal firearms. The IGP said that the mission will be implemented during the next three months. He was speaking at a function held at the Police Headquarters to mark the commencement of work for the New Year. The pledge of the police service was read under the aegis of Pujith Jayasundera. To mark beginning of the New Year, the police have organized religious observances as well. The IGP took measures to hand over two official vehicles to the Colombo Crime Division at the event.
